dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aerial over the city, flying down into a FEDERALE CAR tea through the slums.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Piles of garbage scatter, stray dogs scramble.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MACHETE (MEXICAN FEDERALE OFFICER CRUZ) drives with ROOKI OFFICER ERHMAN riding shotgun. A rosary swings back and f on the rearview mirror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHIEF TORREZ's yells crackle through the police radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Officer Cruz! Stand down! Do not attempt to take the safehouse alone! Officer Cruz! You hear me!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Torrez sounds mad. You going to answer him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete glares. Erhman nervously picks up the radio.

dialogues.speaker: OFFICER ERHMAN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: On route to target, no need for assistance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete, you son of a bitch! I told you to wait! Set up a perimeter and wait for further orders. You hear me, Pendejo!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete slowly takes the radio from Erhman. He hangs up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fleapit motel sits derelict at end of the street. Dead ca on the lawn, chickens scratching in the dirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete guns the engine. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 2.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing? We're going to set up a perimeter right? You heard the boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete pulls his Machete, sticks it up to Erhman's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is the boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ehrman crosses himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A phalanx of ARMED GUARDS emerge from the dead cars. They narrow their weapons at MACHETE's barrelling patrolcar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hijo de puta!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete FLOORS it directly through the DEAD CARS and righ through the FRONT WALL of the fleapit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erhman flies THROUGH THE WINDSHIELD into the far wall. Th car stops in front of the check-in desk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete steps out. The dust clears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More ARMED MEN stream from the office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MACHETE sideswipes the first THUG with his MACHETE, swing him around to face the fire of the others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THUG ragdolls around like a marionette long enough for Machete to slash one of the men's wrists, sending his aim wild and taking out the others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete kicks open a door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Naked girl on the bed. As if she was expecting him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get dressed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He checks the windows. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 3.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's too hot for clothes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Checks her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's been drugged.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He lifts her, ass over his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey... what's your name?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She tries to read the nametag on his uniform, upside-down

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A THUG with an UZI runs out spraying bullets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete spins and impales his face into the wall. THUG's falls into the girl's hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MORE THUGS emerge from the end of the hallway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She absently pulls the trigger, ripping into the pursuing men. Blood sprays the walls like Jackson Pollock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: New THUGS emerge from the front of the hallway. Machete s around and the girl unloads another spray.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh... wow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Uzi's out of ammo. The girl frowns and drops it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fucked-up patrolcar blocks the way out, for now. Mach resheathes his weapon into a slit in his pants.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Girl arches her back, her crotch in Machete's face, then slides down his front, her breasts brushing his eyes, nos mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need to go. Now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In what? That?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The patrolcar isn't going anywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She rips open his shirt and rubs his tattoo. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 4.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That looks like me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She reaches into his pants.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's this long, hard thing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My machete.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is it sharp?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete looks into her eyes. She smiles drunkenly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She yanks it, drawing it into his femoral artery. Hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He falls to the ground. He didn't see this coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She kicks him backwards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He feels life escaping him. His point of view as:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She reaches down BETWEEN HER LEGS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fumbles with her CROTCH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pulls out a small cell phone from her snatch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More life escapes him. Double crossed. He's ready to give

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pobrecito.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHIEF TORREZ steps in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Como hice? (Sub: How'd I do?)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bueno... pero no tanto. (Sub: Good... but not that good.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shoots her once; she drops, then he empties the gun in her body, making her do a spider dance on the floor. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 5.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You had to stick your neck where it didn't belong, amigo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Torrez?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Torrez's boot connects with Machete's face and he goes backwards onto the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SECOND MAN enters. This is DRUGLORD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, not Torrez. El Santo Muerte, pendejo. (I'm Saint Death, pendejo.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DRUGLORD draws a Samurai sword and SLICES Machete like carving meat. We don't see it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quemalo. Quemalo todo. (Sub: Burn it. Burn it all.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Druglord walks out. Through Machete's blurred vision we s Torrez and other officers lighting rags dipped in bottles tequila and throwing them into the corners of the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The place goes up as they run out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete crawls and collapses as the flames rise around hi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A group of ILLEGALS hunker down in the brush, creeping in moonlight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of them coughs and seizes, obviously sick. Another po at a WATER STATION up ahead, pulling the sick man along.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Headlights of a large TRUCK appear over a ridge. A spotli scans the brush, catches them. ARMED MEN ride in the bed the truck. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 6.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I see em!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The burly driver, VON, shifts into gear and barrels down. They scatter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shots from the truck hit them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One keeps running.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They corner the last illegal. He's lit in the spotlight l Christ on the cross, arms wide in surrender. VON smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome to America.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gunfire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ELEKTRA RIVERS, 20s, lies naked, soaking in a bubble bath She stretches, revealing tantalizing glimpses of her bod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's having her "private time," caressing every inch of body with a phallic loofah. She oohs and ahhs with the jo of pleasuring herself in the tub.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Headlights appear through the venetian blinds. She stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sounds of people getting out of a car, laughing, shushing each other. Then a key in a lock, struggling to open it. door forcibly opens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More sounds of fumbling and shushing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dim lights silhouette two people getting naked and gettin physical.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lights come on. ELEKTRA stands in a bathrobe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COUPLE are stunned. Especially since the naked woman in b looks just like ELEKTRA. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 7.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus, Sis. How long have you known this one? Twenty minutes?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the fuck? You're a twin? Hot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SIS in bed covers up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mind your own business.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm trying to. I've got to get ready for work. And you're in my room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa, whoa. Why don't you join us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What a charmer. You sure know how to pick `em, Sis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've been kicked off the island. Get the fuck out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Naked Man cold-cocks Sis. She's out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Talk nice. And you--get that robe off and get up here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure thing. I like a man who takes control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She sidles up to the man, straddles him in bed, pushes hi hands up to the bedrail and snaps the cuffs on him, cuffi him to the bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the fuck? RNewman / Endeavor Draft 8.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're under arrest, dick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pulls a handgun from her robe, pistolwhips him good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a cop?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hits speed-dial on a cellphone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, this is Agent Elektra Rivers, Homeland Security. I could use some unis at the corner of Newning and Drake for an assault. Suspect in custody.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're fucking hot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (clicking phone shut) Yeah. Thanks. I gotta get dressed now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I watch?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suit yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She strips off the robe, giving him an eyeful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cops take the naked man into custody. Elektra, badge on h suit, gets into her car. Sis appears in the doorway holdi steak to her face. She lowers it, revealing a black eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have a nice day, bitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You too, slut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra drives away. Sis shuts the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra drives. Flicks on the radio. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 9.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: State Senator John McLaughlin is once again under investigation for his ties to an extremist militia organization in the capitol city--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Switching radio to her favorite song as she speeds by--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Men mill about, waiting to be picked up for work as truck

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MACHETE,; older and tougher, strides down the sidewalk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TACO TRUCK honks and pulls to the curb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A window opens. A gorgeous raven haired beauty, LUZ, stretches out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cafe! Taquitos! Tarjetas de llamada! (Sub: Coffee! Tacos! Long- distance calling cards!)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Men walk up and get their breakfast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete strides by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moco, a worker, approaches the taco truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Q-vole, Luz! Dos taquitos de papas con, por fa. Y cafe. (Sub: What's up, Luz? Two potato and egg tacos, please. And coffee.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He digs into the steaming plate of Migas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz's MINI BULLDOG PANCHO runs up and barks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moco throws him some chorizo. He scarfs it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pancho vamanos! Leave him alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's OK Luz. You gotta feed your little man, he's hungry. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 10.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's a fat fuck, don't do nothing and eats all day, like my last husband.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Orale, you ain't getting married again with that attitude.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank god. Why buy the pig when I can get the chorizo for free?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Puta.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moco pulls out a hundred dollar bill and slides it across counter to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their smiles turn serious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz hands Moco a brown box to go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be careful mi amor,and don't leave no scraps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moco looks inside; It's a .357 Magnum

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hands him a french fry box filled with bullets. Moco takes the gear and leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks Luz, Hasta luego.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Via con dios.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz notices MACHETE, standing away from the crowd, She wa him over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looking for something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pushes two tacos and a coffee toward him. He shakes h head no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MaГ±ana me pages. (Sub: You can pay me tomorrow.) RNewman / Endeavor Draft 11.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete takes the food, steps aside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Men circle in an alleyway, laying money down on the groun placing bets on the two fighters in the makeshift ring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One is a brawny thug with a neck like a tree trunk. The o is strong, but not big.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brawny Thug makes quick work of his opponent. The men che

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brawny Thug's HANDLER coaxes the crowd for another oppone

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete walks into the alley. Brawny Thug points at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wants you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete keeps walking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: $500 if you lose. $2000 if you win.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete keeps walking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, you, wetback! You're gonna kiss off $500 for five minutes?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rico, a WORKER, lays a fistful of bills on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hundred on the new guy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HANDLER takes the money, makes a note. Bets start flying money changes hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Orale! Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Benz pulls up into the alley, and a bearded man wearing sunglasses steps out, still in the shadows, watching from distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete and the brawny thug fist fight bareknuckled. Braw gets in several good punches, knocking Machete about, but Machete comes from behind to lay him out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brawny falls on his face with a sickening crunch. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 12.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd goes wild. Rico pockets his winnings. Machete g his and walks off around the corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete is followed by two of Brawny's gangster friends. Another steps in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey man, that was some good work back there. Let me borrow some money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete walks around him. Bruno blocks his path and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: sticks a Glock in Machete's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hand it over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two gangsters behind Machete pull switchblades.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't make us carve you up farmer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A standoff as Machete stares. They all turn when they hea

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I do the carving around here pendejos.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the fuck is this? Get back to the kitchen chica.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz drops her apron and gives them an eyeful. Her tan bod barely covered in cut offs and a blouse. She makes Daisy look like Jabba the Hutt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A CLEAVER is in her manicured hand. She waves him over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come to mami.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gangster One lunges at her. Luz chops into his shoulder

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bruno is distracted, Machete grabs his gun;beats him with

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her dog Pancho bites their ankles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz takes out the others with lightning quick moves. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 13.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gangsters lay beaten, moaning on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete and Luz share a look and part ways.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A MERCEDES BENZ rolls down the street and stops by Machet

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The DRIVER of the BENZ points at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another worker scrabbles to the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not you, Ragged Dick. Him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The worker steps aside. Machete walks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz watches Machete leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz drives, Machete rides shotgun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You speak English?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: $70 a day for yardwork. Hundred for roofing. One-twenty-five for septic. Sewage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I cost the most, because I'm the best there is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Naturally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They drive by a CATHOLIC CHURCH. A Mexican-American PADRE sweeps the steps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can call me Benz. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 14.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're sharp. That's right. Just like the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you looking for, Mr. Benz?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you ever killed anyone before?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete eyes the church as they drive by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Benz parks underground. They take a freight elevator to the office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz hits the lights. The place is nice. Machete don't ca

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drink?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz pours two tequila shots. They shoot em.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like angels pissing down my throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz points Machete to sit behind the desk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He flips open a manila folder, inside is an 8 X 10 of a w dressed 40-something man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you know this man?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete shakes his head no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: State Senator John McLaughlin, Independent from Cocksucker County. As you know, illegal immigrants such as yourself are being forced out of our country at an alarming rate. If he had his druthers, he'd ship you back to old Meh-Hee-Co. That's his platform: Ship `em back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RNewman / Endeavor Draft 15.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But first, he'd make you build a wall along the border for no pay. Not so much as a thank you then get the fuck out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz sees this doesn't impress Machete.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That doesn't sound like your problem.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's where you're wrong, friend. What our senator fails to realize is that this country runs on illegal labor. Thrives on it. Keeps costs down, keeps the wheels moving. Bust that, and the world stops turning. You've chaos and shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you want me to do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For the good of both our peoples, our new senator must die. And for that I will pay you $150,000 cash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz flicks the lights. Tables are laid out with weaponry Machete walks past the automatics and blades. He stops at machete.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You like the machete, huh? Strictly low-tech, but good close-up, or if you're trying to make a particularly brutal point. But it's entirely unsuited to our purposes. Here. Have a look at this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shows him an unassembled sniper rifle. As he lists the specs, he snaps it together perfect. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 16.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (specific dialogue about the weapon, the laser-sight on it, the ammo it uses, then) Cheer up, Charlie. This is your golden ticket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz drops a hollow point sniper shell into Machete's han

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete walks past, the briefcase in one hand, rifle case the other. Families have gathered on the front steps afte baptism. PADRE shakes hands with the parishioners. Seems recognize Machete, but when he looks again, Machete's gon

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete steps up to the taco truck and sets the locked briefcase on the counter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You still owe me, amigo. Two tacos y cafe. What's this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Collateral.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete walks away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Senator JOHN MCLAUGHLIN sits while a foppish Italian cuts hair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A REPORTER sits across from him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But isn't this anti-immigration platform a hard sell in this part of the country, where so many voters have strong ethnic backgrounds?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not at all. Those voters are here legally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RNewman / Endeavor Draft 17.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It cheapens their experience, their hard work, to have people jumping the border, taking advantage of loopholes in our system. It makes a mockery of everything they've worked for and turns it into a big steaming pile of--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hand covers the reporter's recorder. It's Benz.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you, that'll be all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The reporter half-smiles. Benz ushers her out and turns t the hairdresser.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who the fuck is this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Mario. He's my goddamn hairdresser.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get out. Get the fuck out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mario leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got to look good for my constituency.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're in here with a reporter and a fucking shampoo queen, for Christ sake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mario's the best.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People want to know you're one of them. From now on, No manicures, no massages, no English tailored suits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who died up your ass, Benz? I'm elected, you sonofabitch. The people have spoken, by a slim margin maybe, but they picked me. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 18.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And they'll be picking through your trash looking for a reason to fuck you up. I'm doing everything I can to make your Von problem go away. Don't add more fuel to the fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Von... that fat sonofabitch. What does he say?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't give a damn. As long as he lays low and doesn't take a step out of his little tree fort, he and his boys can play soldier till Hell freezes over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trucks and military surplus vehicles are lining up and mo out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VON, driving a big truck, prepares to leave the premises. Shades and a cigar. MAN riding shotgun looks uncomfortabl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe we shouldn't be doing this, Von. Not with the heat we're under.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Congress shall make no law abridging the right of the people peaceably to assemble, and to petition the Government for a redress of grievances." Do you know what that's from?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Constitution?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The First Fuckin Amendment "Congress shall make no law abridging the right of the people peaceably to assemble, and to petition the Government for a redress of grievances." I would like to assemble peaceably as I have some grievances to redress. Now is that all right with you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Man stands down. Puts on his cap. It says "FREEDOM FORCE. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 19.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The trucks roll out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete in JANITOR uniform pushes a mop and bucket to the elevator and steps inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A woman in a business suit, hair pinned back and glasses stops the elevator door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete freezes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not Cisco. You're new here, aren't you? Well, one of the toilets in the ladies' is busted again, and you need to clean it up snappy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Cisco's floor. I'm on 11.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But this is an emergency!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Find Cisco.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The elevator doors shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ELEKTRA enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete wheels a mop and bucket. He pulls a plastic bag o of the gray water and enters the stairwell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete slips the pieces of the rifle out of the plastic and assembles them. He preps for the kill. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 20.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Throngs of people are gathered to hear the Senator's spee The citizen militia led by Von carry signs of support for McLaughlin and other anti-immigration slogans. They wear marked "FREEDOM FORCE."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Across the street, a counterprotest group assembles with signs of their own. Luz's TACO TRUCK is there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're at a crossroads in this great land, and one man has the vision to see us into the future.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our man's up next.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a great day in America, Amen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz stands among the crowd, the brim of a cowboy hat sha his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please join me in welcoming our great State Senator John McLaughlin!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McLaughlin stands at the podium. Behind him hangs a banne LAND OF THE FREE, NOT THE FREELOADERS. The crowds punctua his speech with cheers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Make no mistake, my friends: We are at WAR. Every time an illegal sneaks across the border by dark of night it is an act of aggression against the United States. And I submit to you, it is an overt act of TERRORISM. These people are TERRORISTS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cheers swell in the crowd, spiked with boos and jeers fro across the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete readies the sniper rifle and aims down at his tar

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something catches his eye-a glint of a reflection-as he s ... RNewman / Endeavor Draft 21.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANOTHER SNIPER across the way, aiming another SNIPER RIFL directly at HIM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MACHETE lets off two quick rounds and the SNIPER lets off three shots in rapid succession and one of them catches Machete in the shoulder. He flips onto his back and out o the other sniper's line of sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Down below, Machete's bullet has grazed McLaughlin's chee The second bullet has shattered McLaughlin's shin. The th scrambles for cover as armed guards draw their weapons an scan the skies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete zips up the gray coveralls but the blood starts t seep through. He pushes the mop and bucket and a small trickle of blood runs down the mop handle from where it l against Machete's shoulder and into the bucket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He walks briskly to the elevator and slips inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The elevator stops on the sixth floor. A GUARD enters, talking on a 2-way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roger. I'm on my way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete pushes the bucket and mop out. The guard notices blood on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He reaches for Machete but Machete pulls a hidden blade f the mop handle and jacks the guy with quick, sharp thrust into his neck. The guard slides backwards into the elevat as the door closes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete pushes the bucket and mop towards an open office. There's a fire escape out the window. He heads towards it RNewman / Endeavor Draft 22.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elevator opens as the WOMAN complaining about the toilets earlier steps in and sees GUARD lying in pool of BLOOD. S SCREAMS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frantic down there, as a fight breaks out between Von's a immigration militia and pro-immigrant protesters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz grabs McLaughlin and funnels him into a waiting limousine. The limo screeches as it speeds away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz presses his jacket against the bloody wound at McLaughlin's leg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fuck was that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd say it was a fucking gift from the Gods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get ready for your numbers to rise like Lazarus. A thousand bucks says it was some bean-eating wetback just took a potshot at you. It will put the fear of God into the ethics commission. Now we get you to the hospital, you make your bedside speech and you're set.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McLaughlin looks at Benz, taking it all in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fix me a goddamn drink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete rockets down the fire escape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He lands and a COP smashes the back of his head with a Shotgun butt. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 23.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete flies into garbage cans.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shotguns pump.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks up. Two cops have shotguns pointed at his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go ahead Jorge, I'll grease your chips all over this fucking alley!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the cops cuffs him and shoves him into the backsea a patrol car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's going to turn into a lynch mob if we don't get him out of here now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The patrolmen drive away; A TV CREW spots them and jumps into their van to give chase.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two patrolmen are young, hyped.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is fucking big. This guy took a shot at a Representative.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Senator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Same fucking thing. He could die, and we caught him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, we did. They're gonna hang him like Saddam.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're fuckin' heroes, buddy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The patrol car zips in and out of traffic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna call it in. Unless you want to do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. You go ahead. You're good at it. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 24.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the fuck is that supposed to mean? That I'm not good at the action stuff? Just the pussy stuff?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did I fuckin' say that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you fuckin' mean it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, you and me both apprehended this fuckin' suspect. We frisked him and we cuffed him and now we're bringin' him downtown. We're gonna get a medal for this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't frisk him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, you did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm telling you. I didn't frisk him. You must have done it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't frisk him. I thought you--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, a bolus of BLOOD appears at the driver's mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus fuck! What's wrong, man?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the backseat, Machete has his MACHETE in his cuffed ha stuck through the driver's seat and into the guy's chest. Machete twists the blade and the driver turns the wheel i the direction -- MACHETE is STEERING THE CAR from the BACKSEAT with the MACHETE stuck through the DRIVER!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, fuck!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His foot goes like iron to the floor, gunning the engine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slow down, man!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete jerks the blade to one side and the COP CAR veers into oncoming traffic. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 25.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holy shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cop tries to grab the wheel but Machete jerks the bla in the opposite direction and the COP CAR wrecks, spillin sideways and sliding across the pavement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete slides out through the busted glass and frees his hands on the blade, then limps towards--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TV VAN jerks to a halt and the cameraman gets footage of cop car wreckage and of Machete miraculously walking away

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TV REPORTER hurries to catch up and describe the scene.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ELEKTRA looks up from her teriyaki and martini to the mut TV mounted on the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, turn that up, would you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...at the scene of an incredible accident just moments after the attempt on State Senator McLaughlin's life and we're not sure if this individual was in custody or was hit by the vehicle but he appears to be injured--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The COP CAR ignites its spilled gas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holy fuck!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The car blows, sending them flying backwards into the sid the TV TRUCK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete is thrown by the explosion into BLACKOUT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra's phone rings. It's her BOSS. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 26.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm watching it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't watch it. Get on it now! I want that suspect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I only know what you know, and right know, you don't know dick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gone, relax.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SNIPER who took a shot at MACHETE watches as the cops sif through the mess left behind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think he's toast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't think. Know. Check the hospital. Check the morgue. Fucking verify.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ELEKTRA arrives. SNIPER gets an eyeful as she crosses the yellow tape barrier.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now that's what I call a fuckable ass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SNIPER drives off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COUNTY MEDICAL is noisy and dirty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SEXY SPANISH NURSE wheels Machete down the corridor and into a room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her tattoos poke out from under her tiny nurse uniform. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 27.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quietly in Spanish) They don't know you're here yet. You were brought in as a Juan Doe. Innocent bystander.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's barely conscious; his vision blurred.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOC FELIX checks X-Rays. Nurse gives him a kiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here he is, Doc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She bends over and gives Doc an eyeful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey Doc... I can feel your eyeballs in my uterus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doc slips a surgical glove on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's investigate that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete coughs into semi-consciousness.

dialogues.speaker: DOC FELIX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh hey, the hero has awoken. Check it out. (Holds up X-Rays) This is amazing. You can see the bullet rebounded, entered the back of the cranium and was stopped by another bullet already lodged in the bone. I've never seen anything like it. If he hadn't been shot before he would be dead now. There's a lesson in there somewhere...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A GRUFF SECURITY GUARD walks in and HANDCUFFS Machete to side of the gurney.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're going to tell me who you're working for or I'll bury your spic ass and have your wife turning tricks for tacos by breakfast. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 28.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, buddy. This is a patient of mine. He's in a fragile state. He's got a bullet in his cranium.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This wetback tried to kill the Senator, Doc! It's all over the TV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah? In that case you better let me keep him alive so you can beat the truth out of him. And collect the reward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Guard lightens up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're alright, Doc. You know how it is, they take our welfare money. There ain't none left for us decent folk... Now you get him lucid so I can torture him good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucid. That's a good word. Go get a coffee and donut out in the lobby. I'll come get you when he's ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be waiting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He leaves. Doc locks the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nurse pulls a leather pouch out from under her garter bel

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside are three hypodermic needles; Orange, Red and Blac

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper and two THUGS pass SECURITY GUARD making a mess of powdered donut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doc uncaps the Orange syringe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete struggles. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 29.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (IN PERFECT SPANISH)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry, amigo, this is not my country. I'm from Cuba; one hundred percent. She's from Puerto Rico. We're all Children of the Sun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Nurse gives Machete a kiss, Doc slaps her ass.

dialogues.speaker: DOC FELIX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Leave him alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now these are my friends. (taps the needles) They will cheer you up special until these bullet holes feel like little butterfly kisses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Nurse blows a kiss at them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doc stabs the Orange one into Machete's arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete's eyes SNAP open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The heart monitor speeds up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doc tosses the needle into the trash can and pulls out th Red one.

dialogues.speaker: DOC FELIX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: This one here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The GUARD bangs on the door.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY GUARD, (0.C.)
dialogues.text: Hurry up in there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doc Felix panics.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...is for me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stabs his own leg with it.

dialogues.speaker: DOC FELIX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh wow, that hit the spot... all the spots!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doc's head vibrates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The GUARD bangs the door.

dialogues.speaker: DOC FELIX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: This one, I call this one "Popeye." RNewman / Endeavor Draft 30.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Felix stabs the Black into Machete's leg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He jolts awake and breaks his shackles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The heart monitor EXPLODES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The GUARD KICKS the door in. Machete knocks him out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete peeks from the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SNIPER and his men walking up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shuts the door. He's cornered.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another way out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait, I got something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doc hands him a wicked tool made of long curved surgical steel called a--

dialogues.speaker: DOC FELIX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: SKULL SCRAPER. We use this to scrape the bones clean. It cuts through flesh like butta.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete slips the Nurses belt off and STRAPS the surgical tool to his arm like captain hook.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vaya con Dios.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doc and his Nurse cruise past the approaching Henchmen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete clamps an OXYGEN CANISTER to the back of the gurn

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lays on it and shoots the valve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It EXPLODES him through the door. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 31.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete soars down the hall with a FIREBALL behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He blasts henchmen as he flies by, the corridor of window shatters. SNIPER ducks for cover.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His HOOK ARM SLICES a man's belly open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete CRASHES through a window at the end of the corrid

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete FALLS ten stories.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A middle aged couple is having a nice drive listening to local RUSH LIMBAUGH spew vitriol about illegals.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look up, smiles fade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COUPLES POV : Machete falls face first towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He CRASHES through the windshield into their laps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The car drives through the front window of a coffee shop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete climbs out, into the night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hospital is modern, tranquil, in sharp contrast to Co Medical. Miles Davis plays softly over the speaker system

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra walks down the hallway, high heels clip-clopping.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She enters. Mclaughlin is making a statement on the phone

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz gives her a hard look, waves her away to wait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This act... this cowardly act...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RNewman / Endeavor Draft 32.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: will not end my struggle, to keep our country safe from those who would destroy it. God bless everyone who stood with me today, I will return to the fight. And God Bless America.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz takes the phone from him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No further statements. We only hope that the perpetrator is brought to swift justice in an American court.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra flashes a badge at McLaughlin. Benz hangs up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra Rivers, Department of Homeland Security.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is a state matter. We've already talked to--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DHS has jurisdiction over everyone so give it a rest, Mr--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth. Michael Booth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know what I can do to help you in here, Agent Rivers. You want to find the bastard did this, go look for him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I appreciate that, sir, and I

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McLaughlin spits on her shoe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't assure dick. Just ask what you want and then you can be on your way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She keeps her steely resolve as she pulls out a small not pad. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 33.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is the shooter known to you, I mean, did you have any warnings or communication before today?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ELEKTRA looks over at Benz, gets nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My expertise is in profiling and assessing risks of potentially dangerous individuals who are in this country illegally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like you missed one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burn. Then, not missing a beat--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Would you like additional DHS officers assigned to your security detail?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The senator is trying to project an image of resilience, not fear. Now I'm sure you'll agree, the Senator has had a very trying day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here's my card, in case you change your mind. Or you think of anything else.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hands Benz her card.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll be the first person I call.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra leaves and Benz drops the card in the trash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete runs down alleys, slowing, tired.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LUZ'S TACO TRUCK sits at the end of the alley. Machete approaches as Luz is cleaning up. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 34.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hijo de la chingada. What happened to you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SNIPER surveys the damage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth isn't going to like this. What are we going to tell him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Oops."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TACO TRUCK pulls into a garage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz helps Machete to the bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll be safe here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz sets a pot to boil with all kinds of herbs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz returns with the boiling pot and sets the briefcase d

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you open it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete nods and Luz opens it. It's filled with cut newspaper. She shows him. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 35.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing worth nothing here, unless you were going to make a pinata. Now lie back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete lays down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz scoops the boiling goop onto his wounds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what this is, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete nods yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Works every time. When the sun rises, you'll be good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete feels her long legs up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know about that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuidado, chico. You might burn yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She places a Mexican blanket on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why are you helping me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know why Machete.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, but I know the myth of the last honest cop in Mexico.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The myth might be better.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cada uno lleva su cruz (sub. We each have our cross to bear)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete pulls her down onto him. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 36.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra drives into the driveway. There's a Texas Ranger pickup already there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good. Now I can get some answers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra comes in. Place looks deserted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McGraw? McGraw, are you here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra unholsters her sidearm, and scopes the place out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thumping coming from the bedroom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She assumes her best vigilant stance and kicks open the d

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ranger MCGRAW (late 20s) lies in bed while SIS rides him a cowgirl should, not missing a beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goddamnit! You're fucking my sister?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your sister? Holy shit. I thought it was you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuckin' liar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sis rides on, not giving a shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you at least get me the files?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure I did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McGraw is preoccupied with the business at hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, where the hell are they? RNewman / Endeavor Draft 37.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh... uh... uhh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never mind. I see `em.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She snatches a file from the bedside table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you need me, I'll be in the bath. Slut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra exits. McGraw howls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz's home is a nice ranch-style spread.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz sits at the head of the table eating with his wife, and daughter, APRIL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The nerve. An honest, dedicated American like John. What on earth were they thinking?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They weren't, dear. They weren't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I worry more about April. What kind of world are we leaving her?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think Cole is going to ask me to marry him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, honey that's--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I don't want to marry him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Terrible. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 38.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean, look at me. I'm not ready for that kind of commission.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Commitment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That either. I have priorities.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: School, career. Those come first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm talking about my modeling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a beautiful girl, April, but that's a tough nut to crack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No it isn't. Do you know how many hits I've gotten on my website?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have a website?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She has a website. You know about this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: June nods yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know what the online public wants, and they want me. All of me. Cole's just going to have to wait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz sees Sniper coming up the driveway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll talk about this later. I'll be in my office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz walks off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering to April) Are there cute guys on there? You need me to inspect them I think. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 39.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No way! You're such a slut, Mom! You're a Cougar slut!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They laugh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz enters to find Sniper already there, pouring himself drink. TV is on mute in the background.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope you've got something to celebrate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artist's sketch of MACHETE fills the TV screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's off the grid. Sonofabitch disappeared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz points to a map of the city on his desk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I picked him up here. Find out if anyone's seen him. He couldn't have done it on his own. He has help. Find the help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete wakes up, alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A note on the pillow reads - breakfast in oven.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete opens the oven door and takes out a plate of stea MIGAS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He eats and looks around at Luz's pictures on the walls; as a young girl on a farm in Mexico, Protesting at a university, Newspaper articles about the riots, in Rebel in the mountains, the pictures reveal a serious past behi the hot taco lady. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 40.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TRUCK is waved through the gate by armed guards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Druglord being serviced by a trio of women.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TORREZ, older, enters. DRUGLORD is unfazed, keeps right o trucking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Druglord stops in mid-fuck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The first girl leaves off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All of you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other girls follow her and exit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Texas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take all the men you need. But bring him back alive. I want to kill him with my own hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra sits at her desk, going over Machete's file. Phot of Machete in Federale uniform, mugshots of YOUNG MACHETE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pulls a sheet that reads: PSYCHIATRIC EVALUATION in Spani

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Problems with authority. Prone to violence. Fatalistic, ruled by a sense of destiny and purpose."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RNewman / Endeavor Draft 41.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dirt streets. Cinder-block houses with tin roofs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YOUNG MACHETE, 8, long hair, plays swordfighter in the st with a stalk of sugar cane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (v.o.) "Father was a preacher who butted heads with the local drug baron."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Low Angle, slo mo - PREACHER DAD with a sign around his n and waving a Bible, shouting wordlessly. There are hypode needles in the street at his feet. He kicks them away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (v.o.) "Inherited sense of destiny from father."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barefoot women cut white powder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Preacher Dad bursts in with a Bible in one hand and a lit TORCH in the other. Shouting in Spanish. Women scatter as sets fire to everything inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FIVE MEN walk in with clubs, bats, and a MACHETE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THEY ATTACK Dad. BLOOD SPRAYS on the flowers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (v.o.) "Subject was the first to find him."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Young Machete walks through the gate, waving his sugar ca sword. We see glimpses of gore as he does. CU EYES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (v.o.) "Subject developed Old Testament- style concepts of vengeance at an early age. Sense of righteousness." RNewman / Endeavor Draft 42.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He drops his sugar cane sword and picks up the BLOODY MAC used to kill his dad. (SLO MO)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KILLER 1 plays foosball in the back. The ball pops into t air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hand catches it; reveal young Machete.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Killer 1 reaches for the ball. Young Machete CHOPS his ha OFF.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Killer 1 falls; another CHOP, blood sprays Young Machete' face, he doesn't blink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KILLER 2 on the phone. He looks down at Bloody Young Mach

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MACHETE STABS the man THROUGH the GLASS booth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A group of Mexicans playing late night Soccer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ball is kicked into the bushes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KILLER 3 runs in to get it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He doesn't come out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Throw the ball back, Pendejo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ball FLIES out of the bushes and lands on the field..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Except it's NOT a ball! It's Killer 3's HEAD bouncing tow them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KILLER 4 sits on the couch watching a spanish sitcom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MED SHOT - he's laughing hysterically - His smile fades.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A stream of blood pours down between his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He falls forward revealing a knife buried in his head and Young Machete standing calmly. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 43.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doorbell rings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KILLER 5 answers in bathrobe and cigar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Young Machete stands there, knife in hand, covered in blo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you want, little maricon? What you going to do with that knife? You think that scares me? You think...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (v.o.) "Subject's macabre killing methods traced to childhood tragedy."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SLURRMP! KILLER 5's head is impaled on a wooden stake, we are now at...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pull back to reveal five heads on stakes surrounding a cu plywood tree house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SWAT TEAM converges on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Young Machete in his Zorro pajamas eating cereal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TEAR GAS CANISTER flies in through the top and lands in cereal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SWAT TEAM rushes the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A cell door SLAMS on Young Machete's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (v.o.) "Recommendation: Total lockdown."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boss enters. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 44.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You look like you've seen a ghost.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. But I read the ghost's file. My local contact Mcgraw got it from the hot sheets down south.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Local contact?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ex-boyfriend. Whatever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's dangerous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I knew there was a reason we kept you on here. It's your brilliant insights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm working on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get him. The hammer's coming down on us hard for this, so if you fuck up, it's not just your ass on the chopping block, it's mine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want me to put this background on the air?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I could give a fuck. Just get him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete walks into the church he drove by with Benz earli

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete steps into the confessional. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 45.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The little door slides open, wooden cross "windows" light scene.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bless me, Padre, for I have sinned. It's been a long fucking time since my last confession.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was wondering when you were going to show yourself. They're combing the city for you. How long before they get your file and track down your stepbrother, the priest?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, bro. I mean, Padre.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were wrong to come here. How long have you been here anyway?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Few weeks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why didn't you come to me before?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Didn't need you before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you think I can do for you? Give you absolution? You have to be sorry for your sins, first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not surprised.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They used me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They use all of us. Welcome to the real world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They need to pay. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 46.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In money or blood?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Either. Both.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am a man of faith. I took a vow of peace. You want me to help you kill all these men?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, bro. I mean, Padre.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll see what I can do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Padre shakes his head, makes the sign of the cross.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz's taco truck in its usual spot. Luz is sitting at the window playing with LOTERIA CARDS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper pulls up. Shows Machete's picture to men who try t avoid him. He braces a few of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey Culero, leave them alone. They don't like pork.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shows her the sketch of Machete.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm no cop. You seen this guy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz flips over a LOTERIA CARD with the grim reaper. She s it to Sniper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you seen him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper slaps it out of her hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cono,this won't end pretty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He grabs her arm, pins it to the counter and jabs a switchblade into it, carving out a phone number. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 47.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Call me when he shows or I'll carve that pretty face of yours into a seven layer burrito got that puta!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He holds the switchblade up to her face and leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete follows Padre into the church sacristy, a plush bachelor pad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When I get the money, I'll give some to the church.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think Jesus wants your blood money, Judas?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete shrugs. Padre lights a cigar and pours them two drinks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How much blood money are we talking about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hundred-fifty thousand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus, Mary and Joseph! I want you to say ten Our Fathers, ten Hail Marys and ten Glory Be's, and I want you to light a candle for Dad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete eyes a bank of security monitors. Different surveillance shots of the interior and exterior of the church.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had them installed last year. Too many things were walking away from the altar, the collection plate. Check this out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Padre points at a kneeler in front of a rustic altar-look armoire. Machete kneels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Padre opens the armoire revealing an HD TV inside. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 48.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No time for that now. You need to see this. I Tivo'd it earlier.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: News footage of the sniper attack plays. Machete sees him on the big screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Padre pauses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete picks out BENZ helping MCLAUGHLIN into the LIMO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That one. He's the one who hired me. Benz.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's Michael Booth. McLaughlin's aide or something. Cabrones, los dos. Why would he hire you to kill his boss?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The video replays part of the interview with McLaughlin f earlier.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .....that I may return to the senate and fight on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (voice-over on TV) Polls show McLaughlin's numbers are surging since the assassination attempt and officials say they've put a hold on the ethics committee investigation into McLaughlin's ties to the Freedom Force militia. Meanwhile, police continue to scour the city for the perpetrator. If you have any information on the whereabouts of this man--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete's mug fills the screen. Padre clicks it off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where does he live?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete, you can't just kill everyone! RNewman / Endeavor Draft 49.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll leave some for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not what I meant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper looks around. Chop Shop GUY approaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you looking for, gringo?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This guy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shows them the sketch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like my sister's boyfriend's cousin's mother's son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're sharp. You're liable to get cut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper about to make a move, but sees he's outnumbered he Sniper puts his hands up, walks out backwards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Safety first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz sits behind McLaughlin's desk. Sniper across from hi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lead's ran cold. He's underground. Probably back in the homeland by now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz's fax machine powers on. Benz snaps his fingers and Sniper pulls the fax as it's coming out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ho-ly shit. Who knew that your Mexican day laborer was a goddamn Federale?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Phone rings. Benz answers. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 50.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holy Mother of Christ. You've got some balls. You missed, asshole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or else.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or else what?...Hello?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete hangs up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He drives the windy road to Benz's estate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He parks the Hearse at the back, gets out and follows the sound of girls' laughter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete walks through some bushes and comes out at a waterfall and natural spring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: June and April are skinny dipping. They giggle. They spot Machete and cover themselves with their arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, you're not the usual boy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He called in sick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That little bastard promised me a ride on his leafblower.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They laugh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't be shy. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 51.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Showing herself...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you come in? The water's fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right. Come on in, sugar! We like variety around here, no matter what the boys say. You want a wine cooler?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete holds up a bottle shaped like a cross.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, momma! He's got the good stuff!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They play with Machete in the pool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Girls drink from the Cross Bottle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back door of the hearse SLAMS shut on the girls passed ou cold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete speeds away with the girls in the hearse. He pass BENZ driving home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz enters to find the phone ringing. He answers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: June? April?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or else this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is my wife and daughter!?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Click. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 52.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Padre opens the back of the hearse and sees the naked mom daughter passed out inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Padre crosses himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Von watches as militiamen practice maneuvers sticking bayonets into burlap Mexican effigies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A MILITIA MAN leads SNIPER and BENZ into Von's presence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, well, Look what's come asking for Papa Von's help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's beyond my reach, Von. I need you on this now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You needed me from the get go, but let's not piss on what's past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's got my wife and daughter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sweet Jesus. I bet he's got a big imagination what to do with a couple cutie pies like that. Makes me ill just thinking about it. You must have broken off a dick in his ass. First he comes after your boss, then he comes after your family. Who's next?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just find him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz and Sniper turn to go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ain't you worried about staining the Senator bringing us into this? RNewman / Endeavor Draft 53.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you read the papers? McLaughlin's a goddamn saint, a fucking martyr. I've seen to that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz and Sniper leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you think he meant by that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Von fires his pistol in the air. The men look over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boys! We're goin hunting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yee-has as they file into trucks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra is in her BMW staking out the church with binocul

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her POV through binocs; A GUN BARREL blocks the view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete's mug five inches from her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He slides in the passenger side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She does.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can put the gun away. I'm not going to give you any trouble.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a cop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Homeland Security. I guess that makes you a terrorist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did you find me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
