dialogues.text: Come on. Give me some credit. It's not every ex-Federale-turned- assassin that has a local priest on the family payroll. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 54.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Turn here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She does.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So are you going to tell me why you did it? Destiny, maybe?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was just a job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A job? Who hired you? The undocumented workers' union?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michael Booth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sonofabitch. Can you prove that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe. Turn here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She does.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me ten dollars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ten bucks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra digs into her purse. Pulls out a $10.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra stops the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete gets out, approaches Luz's taco truck. Luz looks beyond him to Elektra in the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You get around. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 55.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete lays the ten on the counter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For the tacos and coffee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She reaches for the ten and Machete grabs her wrist, sees sniper switchblade scar. She pulls away, slips the money between her breasts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, they came looking for you. I told them nothing, as far as I know you're a myth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete gets back into Elektra's car. Elektra looks acros him at Luz.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Feelings of righteousness and purpose."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the rear view mirror; A TRUCK SPEEDS towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure thing, Boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The truck REAR ENDS them, sending Elektra's car over the curb. They rattle around inside like ragdolls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sonofabitch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She jumps out, pissed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the fuck, man?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Militia men open fire, her windows shatter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She ducks back in, peels out. The truck revs up and pursu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A second TRUCK joins the chase.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They sandwich Elektra's car between them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete chops off the driver's hand of the right-side tru and the truck veers off, crashing. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 56.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They keep up the gunfire. A slug catches Machete's should

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My gun!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete unholsters it and fires at the truck. The handcan shatters the engine block and the truck flips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No hospital.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me bring you to a safehouse. I can negotiate your safety. We'll bring Booth down together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Onions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want onions?! Oh shit, you're delirious, dying. Don't die please.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Onions!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? What do you do with...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a mess.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete chops onions. A pot boils over with thick green fluid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pours the boiling green gunk into a bowl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What, is this some "old Aztec" shit that's supposed to heal you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sucks the mixture up with a TURKEY BASTER. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 57.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hands it to her. It smells nasty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do I do with this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete points to the hole in his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait, you want this gunk squirted in there...I don't...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete takes a swig of Tequila.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I....can't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She takes a swig, pops a pill and stares at the bloody ho

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She holds her arm up ready...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She JAMS the baster in. The fluid squirts in the hole and SIZZLES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra watches in awe as dark green fluid dribbles out o the wound, followed by a thick yellow goo with veins and lumps of flesh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It bubbles like a volcano, she peers in and suddenly...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It BURSTS and SPRAYS pus and flesh chunks all over her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahhhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra runs screaming into the bathroom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: April and June rouse from two small cots in a drugged and drunken stupor. They're surprised to find they're naked i windowless room. There's a small webcam in a corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom? Where are we? I'm scared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me, too, honey. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 58.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is this place?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POV: WEBCAM. Grainy B&W image.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They embrace, huddle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra walks out in a hot new outfit, blow drying her ha

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was disgusting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete smashes knife handles off and fits the blades int belt under his jacket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you mind not breaking knives in the house? It's kind of one of my rules. I mean...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra's phone rings. It's Boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh shit. All right. I'm going to tell him what you told me. Wish me luck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where the hell have you been?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had a little fender bender.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goddamnit! I said where have you been?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Calm down! I have him right now. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 59.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, but it's complicated. He's innocent. Sort of.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sonofabitch. What kind of Stockholm Syndrome bullshit are you trying to pull?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just listen. Michael Booth orchestrated the assassination attempt on McLaughlin's life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His own advisor?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right. This was all some kind of hare-brained scheme to call off the ethics investigation. I think I can get Machete to testify.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You do, huh? Well that doesn't matter because no charges are going to be filed against Booth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The order's come down from top brass: No more black eyes on DHS. Bring in the Mexican. Dead or alive. Now are you gonna DO your fucking job or are you gonna LOSE your fucking job?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra is stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Rivers! Agent Rivers! Answer me, goddamnit! RNewman / Endeavor Draft 60.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra hangs up, throws the cellphone into the bowl of g onion gunk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks around for Machete, but he's disappeared while was on the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Padre sits at a computer, with streaming webcam video of and April on the screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you want me to do with this? We can't keep them locked up forever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Battered trucks roll in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Makeshift infirmary for the wounded.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Von oversees the patching up of several of his men.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The day is upon us, my friends. We'll take down the interloper, and anyone who gets in our way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Subdued chorus of mild approval.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you believe in freedom?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Louder chants of "yeah!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you die for freedom!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Louder -- "YEAH!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If that's what it takes to make you free, I will kill you with my own bare hands, Amen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The men look at each other as if trying to gauge the big man's sanity. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 61.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heal up, brothers. Heal up good. The day is upon us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper patrols the streets, looking for Machete.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His cellphone beeps with notice of a video message -- LIN APRIL'S WEBSITE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He checks it out -- the WEBCAM footage of April and June naked in the windowless room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz calls him. He clicks over from the message with his bluetooh earpiece so he can still see the webcam video.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You seeing this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to find him. We have to find him now! I'm going to rip his heart out with my teeth!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz is being followed by Sniper and his goons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz pulls into her driveway, into the garage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She steps out of the truck carrying supplies. Her dog Pan behind her. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 62.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GOON ONE is there with his boot in her crotch. She double over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SNIPER and a HENCHMAN walk up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's your boyfriend?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You again? You keep coming back up like bad menudo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper pulls his cellphone, clicks it on so that she can

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: April and June nude in the locked room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's that? Your mother?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is he keeping them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: April and June pull out NUNS' ROBES from a closet. They h them up to see if they'll fit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not gonna think it's funny when I cut you a new twat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz swings the SPINDLE of PORK into the goons belly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stands. Her KNIFE ROLL unfurls, she grabs two knives GOON TWO leaps at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a BLUR she slices off his EARS like she's chopping oni

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pancho runs in and gobbles them up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SNIPER and his henchmen open fire with their MACHINE GUNS Luz dives back into the taco truck. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 63.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz ducks and runs through the truck, as bullets blast ap everything. She grabs a gun and shoots back through the windows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrapnel sprays her face, a huge SLIVER of GLASS SINKS in her eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She yanks it out and shoots back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hijo de Puta!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz is shot in the chest, she flies back blood spewing ou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She sees the men reloading through the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz is bleeding, one eye gouged out, fading fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're coming with me Maricons!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With her last strength Luz opens the gas valves on the st and passes out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper and henchman finish reloading and raise their guns

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper sniffs the air, smells the gas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck that, you wait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The overeager henchman opens fire. The bullets slam into truck ignite the gas and it EXPLODES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are blasted back by the fireball.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper and the Henchman wake up amidst the burning wrecka

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Man...what happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper shoots him in the face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moron. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 64.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His cellphone rings. It's Booth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anything?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She wasn't very cooperative.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell is that supposed to mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper takes a look at the webcam images on his cell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: April and June wearing the nuns' robes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're in a church. I know where.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shorthand version -- to be fleshed out)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SNIPER and some HENCHMEN surround the church.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mount a siege of the church.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gunfight with Padre. Exploding candles as bullets rip thr the church. Elderly Hispanic women in shawls scatter and for the doors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gun battle continues outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Padre goes to car trunk, pops it, withdraws two big shotg

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Henchmen in a car try to run him down. He blows the car i the air with double-blasts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Padre faces down a HENCHMAN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please, Father. Have mercy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: God has mercy. I don't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Padre blows his head off. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 65.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper shoots off Padre's leg at the knee joint. Padre go down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper drags Padre inside the church.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth smashes down a door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the room where June and April were.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's empty. The nuns' robes are on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper and a few of the henchmen hold a battered Padre do on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In your nightmares.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper looks to Booth, who nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper hammers a nail into Padre's hand. Padre grits his teeth against the pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're afraid to get your hands dirty, so you make others carry out your sins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper raises the hammer again, but Booth stills his hand takes the hammer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth leans over Padre's other hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want to be a martyr? I'm good at making martyrs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth raises the hammer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like McLaughlin? RNewman / Endeavor Draft 66.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right. In our own way, we can all be like Christ. Too bad for you, you chose the worst way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He slams another nail into Padre's other hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're so drunk with power, you ordered the hit on your own boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is the boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth hammers the nails in one by one. Bloody Padre screa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now for the last time... where are my wife and daughter?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Padre, beaten and bloody, laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz puts two in his chest. Padre expires.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A produce truck filled with migrant workers stops on the roadside near an onion field. Workers spill out of the ba and get to work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The last two out are April and June.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look up and down the road. It stretches forever with sign of civilization anywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A worker tosses burlap sacks at their feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete returns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete sees Padre crucified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra sits in a bench at the rear of the church.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I came back to look for you, and I found him like... this. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 67.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete seems oblivious to Elektra. Focused on Padre's lifeless crucified body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YOUNG MACHETE dropping the sugarcane sword and picking up MACHETE...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Swinging wildly, chopping up the bad guys...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PREACHER DAD's dead body...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another boy's hand picks up the preacher's collar...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Puts it on... YOUNG PADRE...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YOUNG PADRE watches SWAT team surrounding treehouse...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YOUNG PADRE watches YOUNG MACHETE led away in chains...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YOUNG PADRE enters church...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "The more things change--"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Spanish) (in Spanish) "--the more they stay the "--the more they stay the same." same."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what my Grandma used to say.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guards told me that before they beat me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You came to arrest me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not me. I'm out. But others will.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Out? RNewman / Endeavor Draft 68.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They don't care about Booth. They just want to wipe you out. You're an embarrassment to the feds. I guess I am, too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She comes close to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You could have killed me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The day's still young.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want to help you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She kisses him once, again. Again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Help me find Booth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra weighs it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: First things first, I need a drink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra and Machete walk in laughing with a bottle of Tequila. She flops down on the couch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit my heel is broke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give it here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's nice having a man around. It's been a while.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete pulls out some tools and fixes her heels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How long awhile you ask? Well, About two years.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete looks up. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 69.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh that got your attention? Hmm, Actually you're better than my last boyfriend. He never listened. I don't know why I got so desperate. Don't want to grow old alone I guess. You ever get that feeling you're alone and that you'll never meet that one person...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete's POV: He sees Elektra talking, but only hears a monkey like jabbering coming out of her mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you listening to me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete takes a drink off the Tequila bottle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Si.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me that bottle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hands it to her. She swigs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what happens now, when you get him, that's it? It's over?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra hears a noise in the back of the house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you hear that? Stay here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra runs into the back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete hears a scream from the bedroom. He heads towards

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete enters. The lights are low.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra grabs him from behind, gropes him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh wow...is that a machete in your pocket or...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're borracha. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 70.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pushes him down on the bed and stands over him. She's lingerie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna fuck your brains out old man!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pushes him back onto the bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She tears her clothes off, jumps on him and fucks his bra out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guns are loaded. Shotguns racked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Men with guns run up the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra's on top; manic, yelling, scratching. The bed fra

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete sees a SHADOW of a man through the window curtain another...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He tries to push her off him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She WON'T let him! She's an animal, screeches and yells i SPANISH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete grabs the gun off the night table, just as the HI SQUAD gets there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He manages to keep Elektra happy as he BLASTS the MASKED HITMEN coming in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They crash through the windows and doors as he finishes everyone off at once.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra lets out a final scream and collapses on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow that was...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She notices the carnage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my god...did I wake the neighbors?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They get up. She pulls the ski mask off a dead gunman. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 71.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is one of ours. He works for the agency.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They grab guns and run out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete and Elektra run outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper and his men are waiting for them; guns drawn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He waves for his men to lower their guns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete you can come quietly and we won't hurt the girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete contemplates this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can trust me. I've brought one of your old friends to vouch for me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erhman waves with his BANDAGED hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hola Machete amigo, long time!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erhman beams a big cheese eating smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete draws his gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not long enough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erhman's smile fades. Machete SHOOTS him in the face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete and Elektra open fire with machine guns and speed in a Volkswagon bug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra enters. She's slowly surrounded by rough-looking Mexicans. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 72.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My friend and I need a little help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They see Machete behind her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete sharpens blades, makes all kinds of razor-sharp m weaponry in the chop shop, using all kinds of scrap metal

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete lays down sketches and blueprints. The men and Machete build out a tricked-out arsenal on tricked-out vehicles, like something out of a south of the border Roa Warrior.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete sharpens his blade as sparks fly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper cruises by, hunting for Machete.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The chop shop boys spot Sniper snooping. They bring out a huge blowtorch and carve up his hood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You punk kids! That's it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper climbs out of his car, gun in hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A steak KNIFE flies in from off screen and skewers his wr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stumbles back gushing blood,and sees...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz; alive and well, a red eye patch on. She's wrapped in white bandages crossing and covering her chest and her ar

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's a mess but a beautiful one, like a female road warr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Band aids on her forehead. The white bandages cover her d skin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cabron, I told you it wouldn't end pretty. (to the guys) Bring him inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They drag Sniper out of the car and into the chop shop. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 73.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You, I got you, what...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It pays to have friends, Pendejo. They got your ass when you need it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back to the moment Luz has passed out in the truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pancho barks; BITES Luz on the ASS and pulls her out of t Taco Truck seconds before it explodes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sniper struggles as they drag him toward a circular saw.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looking for someone?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God... Please... No. Please!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They bring Sniper up to the saw and grind away at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz and Pancho look on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: News crews gather outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth walks towards McLaughlin's room, cellphone in hand, trying to reach Sniper. Only gets a gurgling, buzzing sou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goddamn A T & T. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 74.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth enters McLaughlin's hospital room. McLaughlin is dressed in a suit and a girl is brushing his hair while another brightens his cheeks with a little makeup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where the fuck have you been?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taking care of business.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My business is here. Did you see those crews out there? They expect a statement. (noticing Booth's ragged

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus, what happened to you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing. Just had a little talk with a priest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, what am I going to tell `em?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever you tell them, I'm sure it'll be golden. (off McLaughlin's blank

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just feed them the line about standing steadfast in the face of terrorism, continuing the fight. You know it by heart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McLaughlin looks relieved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I do. All right. Once this is done, you need to take a vacation. You need some air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No doubt about it. You're losing your marbles, Booth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The girl finishes the makeup and hair job, and smiles at McLaughlin. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 75.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's showtime.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McLaughlin stands and exits, Booth right behind them. As leave, we focus on the TV set in McLaughlin's room, showi the front of the hospital and the news crews outside. Suddenly the ticker shows BREAKING NEWS... SHOOTOUT AT LO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yellow police tape around the perimeter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Torrez watches from a distance, looking around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Torrez sees Elektra's car drive by. He hops into his rent and follows her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McLaughlin and Booth exit the hospital to face the throng reporters. McLaughlin approaches a makeshift lectern of microphones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd just like to thank the all of you for your support during this difficult time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McLaughlin's supporters cheer and hold up pro-McLaughlin, anti-immigration signs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My will to fight has only just begun. We must not let the terrorists win this battle for our land, our America! Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More cheers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the reporters steps up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Congressman, there are reports implicating your advisors as having orchestrated the shooting. Would you care to comment?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cheers fizzle. McLaughlin looks stunned. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 76.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do what now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Webcam footage plays of Booth in the church.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want to be a martyr? I'm good at making martyrs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like McLaughlin?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He slams another nail into Padre's other hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're so drunk with power, you ordered the hit on your own boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McLaughlin looks to Booth, but Booth is GONE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No further comment. Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McLaughlin ducks back inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McLaughlin stumbling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could somebody fucking help me? I think I'm having a heart attack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth takes hold of him and ushers him out the back door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Outside McLaughlin's supporters are dazed and confused. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 77.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth drives. McLaughlin pops vicodins with a bottle of Maker's Mark.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you do, Booth? You jeopardized my career with that wetback! He could have fucking killed me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not with that scope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You stupid sonofabitch. You pull something like this, without consulting me?! You fucked me. You are a stupid sonofabitch. The press is going to demand answers! You got another brilliant solution for that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, MACHETE is standing on top of the limo. He's throwing knives into the open sunroof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McLaughlin is pinned to the seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth exits the vehicle and hightails it. Machete pursues

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth and Machete on the run, after each other. Fistfight the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth scrambles up a fire escape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A group of men are standing around a pitbull pit where tw pit bulls are going at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The men place bets excitedly on which dog will be the vic

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete and Booth fight on the roof. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 78.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete and Booth roll off a roof and tumble into the pit pit, fighting each other as the dogs fight. The men aroun them start placing bets on Machete and Booth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth cuts one of the men and the pitbulls go after him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth escapes from the circle and carjacks a woman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He kicks her out of the car and speeds towards the Armory

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Von! Von!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete comes out of the alleyway. His buddies in their R Warrior rides swing by and pick him up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Follow him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Von's phone rings. Von sits on a couch watching the news. Booth's mug fills the screen. Von makes no sudden move to answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shouldn't you--?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let him stew awhile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Von mutes the TV, answers the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Von here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benz drives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you, goddamnit!? I'm bringing him up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up? Up where?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up your fat, fishbelly ass! RNewman / Endeavor Draft 79.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine. Bring him here. Papa Von's got a big surprise a-waiting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra enters. Place looks deserted again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit. I don't even want to know who she's fucking now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sis is being savagely attacked by Torrez.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra hears it, but thinks it's Sis fucking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fucking shit, bitch. Make him pay for a goddamn hotel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thuds get louder, then stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra looks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sis?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bedroom door opens slowly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra sees the horror inside. Puts a hand to her mouth staunch the flow of projectile vomit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then she's taken from behind by Torrez's henchmen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She was just a warmup. Now I'm ready for dessert.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He edges in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Militiamen guard the gate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth barrels towards the gate. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 80.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He spins out and gets out of the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut the gate quick! He's after me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some of the men shut the gate. Booth approaches Von.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He killed McLaughlin. He's coming after me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you led him right to Papa Von. That's some kind of thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saw to it that McLaughlin gave you the keys to this fortress. You owe us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The senator, maybe. But what exactly do I owe you, turncoat?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you talkin--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You held the hand that held the gun, Booth. Just as good as you killed him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth lunges for him but the other militia men hold him b

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put the traitor in the brig.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They lead Booth away, kicking and spitting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't do this to me, Von! You need me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth is secured in the brig.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth flings hot coffee in the guard's face, jerks his be and smashes the guy's face into the bars. Snags the keys escapes from the brig. He pulls a few bucks out of his po and flings them down Sonny-style on the prone guard. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 81.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth and Von showdown. Booth slaughters Von with an Amer flag through the throat, coming out his spine at the back the neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Glory, glory, hallelujah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROAD WARRIOR vehicles barrel towards the armory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're driving a semitruck --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It crashes through the front gate, then spins as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The backdoor of the semi trailer rolls up revealing

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --as Machete rides it out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete's army of workers stream out from their road warr chop shop rides.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete dismounts. His army behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He raises his MACHETE against the sun and his army all ra theirs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Big battle sequence as they storm the armory. Knives and guns... a ballet of bullets and blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LUZ arrives in one of the HOT RODS from the chop shop. Sh has a MACHETE GUN that shoots out Machete blades like a Machine gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A minuteman grabs her from behind, but..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is STABBED in the CALF by Pancho! A METAL HARNESS onhi back holds a sharp KNIFE that he stabs with.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The minuteman falls, Pancho stabs him in the face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luz leads a gang of her customers into the battle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Minutemen and Mexicanos of all walks of life--janitors, gardeners, laborers, gangbangers, etc.--fight it out at t armory. Fighting it out with the implements of their trad knives hidden in mops, a weedwhacker attack, etc. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 82.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A wailing AMBULANCE CRASHES through a gate running down minutemen. DOC FELIX and his sexy NURSE get out and help wounded Mexican. Doc flicks a SCALPEL at an approaching G

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete unveils a Gatling Gun with a special mount that affixes to the front of the chopper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth scrambles to arm himself, but he's cornered. He tri to take cover behind thugs, but--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete on the motorcycle with the Gatling Gun mows down Booth, machine gunning him in half.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booth looks down at his own white shirt, now stained crim and ripped to shreds as he falls to the ground in TWO PIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: While the battle between chopshoppers and militia rages o

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TORREZ appears with ELEKTRA--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete stops, turns to see Elektra, bound and gagged in Torrez's control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You never learned to stay down, pendejo. I killed you once. I can do it again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete skids into the warehouse. Fuel barrels line a far wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Torrez is ready for him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All roads lead to Hell, eh, Machete?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete squints. Flashes back to the earlier scene. The t images blur into one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Most people die in the fire, but you survived, you unlucky bastard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was born in the fire. It wasn't luck. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 83.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Faith? Yeah, faith got you a good job picking melons. While I bought the world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What good is it...

dialogues.speaker: TORREZ.
dialogues.text: .. for a man to gain the whole world yet forfeit his soul? Mark 8:36. I know it better than you Machete. Your father taught it to me, too!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Torrez ATTACKS Machete

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two FIGHT with sword and machete.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra rolls on the ground, dodging Torrez's rain of blo from the samurai swords.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One sweep slices her bindings and she scrambles to safety

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The distraction is enough for Machete to gain the upper h and slash Torrez across the front.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the edge of death Torrez seems to soften.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete, we were friends. We stood for something...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete impales TORREZ between the eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blood shoots out his mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm still standing...Puta.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete pulls out the blade, Torrez falls dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EXPLOSIONS and black smoke light up the sky behind Machet

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete drives his Gun Bike south. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 84.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COP LIGHTS appear behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Officer walks up. His flashlight blinds him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the problem officer?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Officer just stands there, silent, his flashlight blinding in Machete's eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me give you my ID.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete reaches for his knife: then he sees the cops shoe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RED STILETTOS; It's ELEKTRA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's your name?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I called in some favors. Look at this. All the right papers; a real identity. You could start over, be a real person.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She puts the green card in his hand. Machete looks at it, then crumbles it and drops it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why do I want to be a real person... when I'm already a myth?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where will you go?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Torrez was just an errand boy. I'm going to find the man who sent the message.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elektra steps into the headlights. She's dressed in hot C LINGERIE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll ride with you. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 85.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They kiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machete and Elektra drive away on the gun bike.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cop car abandoned on the side of the road; lights sti flashing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A family of illegals crossing the border in the desert, s WATER STATION up ahead. They make for it, opening it up a drinking heavily from the water supply. A BULLET brings o of them down and the others scramble for safety but there someone out there, shooting at them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MOTHER hushes the younger ones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Say a prayer to El Machete to protect you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The younger ones start to pray.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A JEEP patrols the area and we see it's MINUTEMEN taking potshots at the illegals.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you get `em?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. They're like brown jackrabbits. Let's see if they'll show their little white tails.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flicks on a highpowered light by the side mirrors on the JEEP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The light is on long enough to illuminate a MACHETE BLADE coming straight for them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holy shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His words gurgle in his throat as his head is severed fro his body. 2nd MINUTEMAN freaks and makes a run for it. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 86.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stumbles in the dark, in the dust. Scrambles but can't ge his feet as he sees the outline of a DARK FIGURE above hi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Young illegals' prayers continue as the MACHETE comes dow 2nd MINUTEMAN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sounds of struggle, slaughter... then silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Light a candle... Say a prayer...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Young illegal opens eyes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a glass candle in his hands, but no one else arou Instead of Christ or a Virgin on the candle is a silhouet of MACHETE...
